query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Indonesian.
1 Nel mezzo del cammin di nostra vita 2 mi ritrovai per una selva oscura, 3 ché la diritta via era smarrita.
query.result:
**English:**
1 In the middle of the journey of our life 2 I found myself in a dark wood, 3 because the straight way was lost.
**Indonesian:**
1 Di tengah perjalanan hidup kita 2 aku menemukan diriku di hutan yang gelap, 3 karena jalan yang lurus telah hilang.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Indonesian.
4 Ahi quanto a dir qual era è cosa dura 5 esta selva selvaggia e aspra e forte 6 che nel pensier rinova la paura!
7 Tant’ è amara che poco è più morte; 8 ma per trattar del ben ch’i’ vi trovai, 9 dirò de l’altre cose ch’i’ v’ho scorte.
query.result:
**English:**
4 Ah, how hard it is to tell what it was like, 5 this wild, rough, and strong forest 6 that renews fear in my thoughts!
7 It is so bitter that death is hardly more so; 8 but to treat of the good that I found there, 9 I will tell of the other things that I perceived there.
**Indonesian:**
4 Ah, betapa sulit untuk mengatakan seperti apa, 5 hutan liar, kasar, dan kuat ini 6 yang dalam pikiran memperbarui rasa takut!
7 Begitu pahit sehingga kematian hampir tidak lebih pahit; 8 tetapi untuk membahas kebaikan yang kutemukan di sana, 9 akan kukatakan tentang hal-hal lain yang kulihat di sana.
